interface:
main contract VoiceAeds =
  record state = {index : int,completed_player : map(address, int),voice_records : map(int, VoiceAeds.voice_meta),deployer : address}
  record voice_meta = {voice_link : string,reward : int,max_reward : int,answer : string,id : int}
  stateful entrypoint init : () => VoiceAeds.state
  entrypoint get_voice_records : () => map(int, VoiceAeds.voice_meta)
  payable stateful entrypoint deposit_to_contract : () => int
  stateful entrypoint check_contract_balance : () => int
  stateful entrypoint check_contract_address : () => address
  stateful entrypoint create_voice_record : (string, int, int, string) => bool
  stateful entrypoint delete_voice_record : (int) => bool
  stateful entrypoint update_voice_record : (int, string, int, int, string) => bool
  stateful entrypoint answer_question : (int, string) => bool
  stateful entrypoint clear_completed_player : () => bool
